mapper.insert: insert into ED_APPLICATION (PK_ID, INTERFACE_ID, NAME, DESCRIBE, MAX_NUM, DEL_FLG, CRT_USER, CRT_TIME, UPT_USER, UPT_TIME, NOTE) values (#{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{interfaceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maxNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{delFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{crtUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crtTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uptUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uptTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update ED_APPLICATION set INTERFACE_ID = #{interfaceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIBE = #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAX_NUM = #{maxNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DEL_FLG = #{delFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, CRT_USER = #{crtUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CRT_TIME = #{crtTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPT_USER = #{uptUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPT_TIME = #{uptTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOTE = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select PK_ID, INTERFACE_ID, NAME, DESCRIBE, MAX_NUM, DEL_FLG, CRT_USER, CRT_TIME, UPT_USER, UPT_TIME, NOTE from ED_APPLICATION where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select PK_ID, INTERFACE_ID, NAME, DESCRIBE, MAX_NUM, DEL_FLG, CRT_USER, CRT_TIME, UPT_USER, UPT_TIME, NOTE from ED_APPLICATION

select app.PK_ID, app.MODEL_ID, app.NAME, app.DESCRIBE, app.MAX_NUM, app.DEL_FLG, app.CRT_USER, app.CRT_TIME, app.UPT_USER, app.UPT_TIME, app.NOTE,info.NAME AS MODEL_NAME,mc.cn_name AS CONTRACTOR from udsp.MM_APPLICATION app LEFT JOIN udsp.MM_MODEL_INFO info ON info.PK_ID=app.MODEL_ID left join udsp.mm_contractor mc on info.contractor = mc.pk_id where app.DEL_FLG = '0' and app.NAME like '%'||#{name}||'%' and app.DESCRIBE like '%'||#{describe}||'%' and app.MODEL_ID =#{modelId} and info.NAME like '%'||#{modelName}||'%' and app.CRT_TIME >= #{crtTimeStart} and #{crtTimeEnd} >= app.CRT_TIME and app.UPT_TIME >= #{uptTimeStart} and #{uptTimeEnd} >= app.UPT_TIME and app.CRT_USER like '%'||#{crtUser}||'%' and app.UPT_USER like '%'||#{uptUser}||'%' and mc.pk_id = #{contractor} order by app.UPT_TIME desc, app.CRT_TIME desc, app.NAME asc
